# data migrations

## add empty migration
```bash
python3 manage.py makemigrations --empty my_app
```


## custom data migration
```py
# Generated by Django 3.2.5 on 2022-01-07 20:20

from django.db import migrations


def my_custom_data(apps, schema_editor):
    # We can't import the model directly. We use the historical version.
    TableName = apps.get_model('my_app', 'TableName')
    TableName.objects.get_or_create(my_id=10, title="new 1")
    TableName.objects.get_or_create(my_id=20, title="new 2")
    TableName.objects.get_or_create(my_id=30, title="new 3")


class Migration(migrations.Migration):

    dependencies = [
        ('my_app', '0001_initial'),
    ]

    operations = [
        migrations.RunPython(my_custom_data),
    ]
```
